name: ACH_TARGET_10
description: Break 10 targets at the merchant's archery contraption.

description: Break 20 targets at the merchant's archery contraption.

name: ACH_TARGET_30
description: Break 30 targets at the merchant's archery contraption.

name: ACH_WHACK_20
description: Earn a score of 20 at Whack-A-Goblin.

name: ACH_WHACK_30
description: Earn a score of 30 at Whack-A-Goblin.

description: Break open 10 destructible objects.

description: Break open 50 destructible objects.

description: Break open 150 destructible objects.

name: ACH_TREASURE_1
description: Collect the spoils of three treasure chests.

name: ACH_TREASURE_10
description: Collect the spoils of 10 treasure chests.

name: ACH_TREASURE_20
description: Collect the spoils of 20 treasure chests.

name: ACH_FIREBALL_ARROW
description: Ignite an arrow with a held fireball.

name: ACH_BURN_ENEMY
description: Ignite an enemy with a flaming arrow.

name: ACH_CATCH_ARROW
description: Catch an enemy's arrow out of the air.

name: ACH_REFLECT_ARROW
description: Reflect an enemy's arrow with your sword.

name: ACH_HITTING_SELF
description: Hit an enemy with one of its own projectiles.

name: ACH_GOBLIN_SLAYER_10
description: Kill 10 enemies.

name: ACH_GOBLIN_SLAYER_50
description: Kill 50 enemies.

name: ACH_GOBLIN_SLAYER_150
description: Kill 150 enemies.

name: ACH_SNIPER_10
description: Land 10 headshots on enemies from long range with your bow.

name: ACH_SNIPER_50
description: Land 50 headshots on enemies from long range with your bow.

name: ACH_SNIPER_150
description: Land 150 headshots on enemies from long range with your bow.

name: ACH_ARCHER_1
description: Unlock a perk on the archery perk tree.

name: ACH_ARCHER_2
description: Unlock the ability to imbue your arrows with magic from the archery perk tree.

name: ACH_MAGIC_1
description: Unlock a perk on the magic perk tree.

name: ACH_MAGIC_2
description: Unlock the ability to cast two-handed spells from the magic perk tree.

name: ACH_MELEE_1
description: Unlock a perk on the melee perk tree.

name: ACH_MELEE_2
description: Unlock the ability to dual wield from the melee perk tree.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_1
description: Turn off the first source of water flooding The Depths in The Forbidden Mine.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_2
description: Turn off the second source of water flooding The Depths in The Forbidden Mine.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_3
description: Destroy the crystal barrier at the end of The Depths in The Forbidden Mine.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_4
description: Unlock the cage in the tall keep at Serafin Castle.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_5
description: Clear the broken wall beneath the lab at Serafin Castle.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_6
description: Open the doors to the throne room of the Serafin Castle Palace.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_7
description: Gain entry to Ghostbeard's first mate's quarters on The Windbreaker.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_8
description: Return all of Ghostbeard's navigation tools to him.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_9
description: Complete the final trial on the Path of the Mage on Godly Island.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_10
description: Complete the final trial on the Path of the Swordsman on Godly Island.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_11
description: Open the door leading to the Serafin Castle Palace.

name: ACH_PUZZLE_12
description: Open the 3-slotted door on Godly Island
